scripts.prepare-pre: ncc build setup.js -o dist --source-map && mv dist/index.js dist/setup.js && mv dist/index.js.map dist/setup.js.map
scripts.prepare-post: ncc build cleanup.js -o dist --source-map && mv dist/index.js dist/cleanup.js && mv dist/index.js.map dist/cleanup.js.map
scripts.prepare: npm run prepare-pre && npm run prepare-post && npm run prepare-main
scripts.all: npm run lint && npm run prepare && npm run test
